doc.field: Gay USA, Vol. XVI, Episode No. 4 [Air date: 1/28/1998]
Gay USA, Vol. XVI, Episode No. 4 [Air date: 1/28/1998]
1. Andy Humm and Ann Northrop discuss recent general events that relate to the LGBT community.
COMMERCIAL: Blue Ball "Come to Life" event in Philadelphia to benefit AIDS Information Network
2. Interview: Michael Swirsky, of ACT UP New York, discusses the name-based reporting of HIV-related information.
COMMERCIAL: Homo Xtra (HX), "The one. The only. The original."
COMMERCIAL: Elizabeth Taylor for AmFAR, "Don't make it five thousand and one"
COMMERCIAL: Cable Positive, "AIDS is not over"
4. Lou Maletta interviews Kate Bornstein, author, regarding her book "My Gender Workbook"
COMMERCIAL: National Foundation for Infectious Diseases, C. Everett Koop, PSA for Hepatitis A
COMMERCIAL: Blue Ball "Come to Life" event in Philadelphia to benefit AIDS Information Network
6. Lou Maletta interviews Doug Witkins, writer and director, regarding his film "No Ordinary Love". Includes film footage.
Gay USA, Vol. XVI, Episode No. 4 [Air date: 1/28/1998]: January 1998
